title: Dimitar Mirakovski
text:
Dimitar Mirakovski (born May 14, 1981), is a former Macedonian professional <a href="basketball">basketball</a> player.
Pro career.
Since beginning his professional career in 1999, Mirakovski has spent the majority of his career playing in the <a href="Macedonian%20Prva%20Liga%20%28basketball%29">Macedonian Premier League</a>. He has also made brief stops in <a href="Siguria%20Superleague">Kosovo</a> with BC Peje, <a href="National%20Basketball%20League%20%28Bulgaria%29">Bulgaria</a> with <a href="CSKA%20Sofia">CSKA Sofia</a> and <a href="A2%20Ethniki">Greece</a> with <a href="Rethymno%20BC">Rethymno BC</a>. He is signed with <a href="KK%20Kavadarci">KK Kavadarci</a> of the <a href="Macedonian%20Prva%20Liga%20%28basketball%29">Macedonian Premier League</a> for the 2009-10 season after spending the 2008-09 season in Greece.
Macedonian national team.
Mirakovski is also a member of the <a href="Macedonian%20national%20basketball%20team">Macedonian national basketball team</a>. He competed with the team at <a href="Eurobasket%202009">Eurobasket 2009</a> and helped the team to a ninth-place finish, its best ever performance at the continental championship at that time.
